text: Infanta María Luisa Fernanda of Spain, Duchess of Montpensier (30 January 1832 - 2 February 1897) was Infanta of Spain by birth and was the Duchess o Montpensier after her 1846 mairriage to a son of King Louis Philippe I of the French. Her husband was Prince Antoine o Orléans, Duke of Montpensier. She was also a sister of Queen Isabel II of Spain. ==Children== # Princess Marie Isabelle of Orléans (21 September 1848 – 23 April 1919) married Prince Philippe, Count of Paris an had children. # Princess Maria Amelia of Orléans (1851–1870) died unmarried. # Princess María Cristina of Orléans (29 October 1852 – 28 April 1879) died unmarried. # Princess Maria de la Regla of Orléans (1856–1861) # [?] (1857-1857) # Prince Fernando of Orléans (1859–1873) # Mercedes o Orléans (24 June 1860 – 26 June 1878) married Alfonso XII of Spain, no children. # Infante Antonio, Duke of Galliera (23 February 1866 – 24 December 1930) married Infanta Eulalia of Spain and had children. ==Titles and styles== *30 January 1832 - 10 October 1846 Her Royal Highness Infanta Doña Luisa Fernanda of Spain. *10 October 1846 - 4 February 1890 Her Royal Highness The Duchess of Montpensier. *4 February 1890 - 2 February 1897 Her Royal Highness The Dowager Duchess of Montpensier. ==Other websites== Category:1832 births Category:1897 deaths Category:Spanish infantes and infantas Category:House of Bourbon Category:House of Orléans Category:Princes and princesses Category:Dukes and duchesses of France Category:People from Madrid
title: Infanta Luisa Fernanda, Duchess of Montpensier
